caption.p: The spatial variation of mean JJAS (June â€“ September) 850 hPa wind pattern over the south Asian region from ( a) ERA-I, ( b) models in convective group GC1, ( c) GC2, ( d) GC3, and ( e) GC4. The biases in mean JJAS 850 hPa wind pattern for different convective groups with respect to reanalysis are shown in ( f) for GC1, ( g) for GC2, ( h) for GC3, and ( i) for GC4.
